content: Nobuyuki Umetani is an associate professor in the University of Tokyo. His research interests include computational fabrication, physics-based animation, machine learning for 3D geometry, data-driven physics modeling, and biomechanical simulation.
summary: Nobuyuki Umetani is an associate professor in the University of Tokyo. His research interests include computational fabrication, physics-based animation, machine learning for 3D geometry, data-driven physics modeling, and biomechanical simulation.
title: Nobuyuki Umetani
